item.title: Dumped Mattress, 10th October
item.description:
Someone has dumped a mattress on the footpath outside my property. This is the third time I have reported it. It has been there since August! Please remove it. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement on Tottenham Court Road northbound just south of University Street, 10th October
item.description:
Permant camp sites along Tottenham Court Road. The one outside M&S is using pallets, a tent and metal barriers to mark out their territory. I assume these encampments outside rate & taxpaying businesses must be playing havoc with their kerb appeal and turnover. There is also a campsite above the Euston Underpass opposite main entrance to UCH. Why is it taking so long to get rid of these eye sores? Facilities need to be made available but the way some of these structures have been set up, they look very permanent and this cannot be allowed. Please get a grip ASAP. (PS don't know where the above photo came from)
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 169, Tottenham Court Road, Fitzrovia, London
Report on FixMyStreet
